attributes.action: NOT sign the 50-page agreement, Declaration on the Future of Europe on March 25th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, demand that there is a referendum of the British public on the subject of the EU constitution BEFORE any agreements or deals are signed up for in Brussels.

If no referendum is held which accurately reflects the wishes of the British public, the British public will not recognise any such agreement as valid.
